radio_info.short: Radio Glarus is a local commercial radio station, broadcasting in stereo on 90,5 FM in the Bourgas region, 24 hours a day. Radio GLARUS was
radio_info.rest:
the first private radiostation in Bourgas and South Eastern Bulgaria and has been broadcasting since 1992. It covers a radius of 100 km around Bourgas, including the Southern Black Sea coast, Pomorie, holiday village "Elenite", the biggest Bulgarian resort Sunny Beach, Obzor, holiday village "Duni", Sozopol, Primorsko, Malko Tarnovo and to the west - Aitos, Karnobat and Yambol. The audience is about 450 000 and during the tourist season (the summer) peaks at over 800 000 listeners.

Opinion polls by GALLUP, NOEMA, FACT give GLARUS the first highest rating in the region - 41% are regular listeners and 71% listen to it. Its audience is the active part of the population in the area - age 18 to 60, social groups include intellectuals, businessmen, workers, students. Many of the listeners are in the higher income groups.

работеше талантливо и като изоглавен в една малка стъклена килийка във вътрешността на страната. През последните години чираците израстнаха бързо, станаха Майстори. radio_info.short: Radio Bravo was created on August 15, 1995 by journalist Toncho Bebov. This is a music and information station with a music format HOT AC
radio_info.rest: - 50/50, which means 50 per cent of Bulgarian and 50 percent foreign music. In an informative radio is partisan and therefore like most wide listening audience. In 1995-2005, Bravo Radio affiliate station of the Bulgarian section of the BBC - London in the summer of 2002 broadcast joint programs with the Sofia Radio Net - every day between 10 and 11 pm

title: Veliko Tarnovo

Enjoy stations such as Радио Фокус Велико Търново, ZigZag, Radio Favorit and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music! radio_info.short: Favorit” Radio is a trade radio wholly automatically and computerized. We began at June 12th 2001 in Veliko Tarnovo at 89.8 FM frequency. Four years
radio_info.rest:
later we widened our region of the programme as we reached new territories. From June 17th 2005 “Favorit” Radio appeared in Botevgrad at 107.8 FM frequency, anf from July 22nd 2005 we reached Razgrad with a flying start.

The programme of “Favorit”Radio is polythematic, with a musical priority towards the listeners of all ages, who like the pleasant and melodious songs of different styles – from pop rock to pop folk, and also they are lively interested in the last local, tiol and world news.
Briefly, our programme is built on the next clearly pointed details : music and musical information, news and sport, information – service, cultural, social, entertainment – games, funny stories, talking that make our image as an intimate, home radio, too near to the persolity, to the friends community.

If the radios can talk, your radio would tell: “I want “Favorit” frequency.
